Description: Funerary papyrus of Paiuenhor containing Book of Breathing made by Isis for her brother Osiris written in hieratic script (sheet 2 of 2).
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Nicholson and Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), p. 242 Herbin, F.-R., Books of Breathing and Related Texts (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead and Other Related Texts in the British Museum IV), London, 2008, pp. 31-37, pls. 9-14.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (186)
Herbin 2008 / Books of Breathing and Related Texts (pp.11-37, pls.1-14)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57735) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57735)
